headline: The EU's effect on Blackpool's beaches  before and after pictures
text: Blackpool beaches In 1988, just six of 29 waters surveyed around the Blackpool region met the EUs bathing water guidelines. By 2014, all of the northern seaside resorts beaches passed the EU test, after some 1bn was spent on clean water improvements.    Blackpool beaches This year, almost 95% of British beaches were given a clean bill of health in the latest EU survey of coastal water quality, down slightly on two years ago.    Blackpool beaches One of Blackpools beaches recently won its first blue flag international award for cleanliness.    Blackpool beaches
